subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The luge relay was contested at an Olympics for the first time on Thursday, challenging supine athletes to pop up and smack a pad while sliding by to open the gates for their teammates.
snippet: The luge relay was contested at an Olympics for the first time on Thursday, challenging supine athletes to pop up and smack a pad while sliding by to open the gates for their teammates.
